name: Ham & Mushroom Sauce
recipeIngredient: 175 g (6 oz) cooked ham (cut into matchstick strips),
recipeInstructions: 1 Melt the butter in a large saucepan. Add the mushrooms and ham and fry for about 5 minutes until softened,

2. Mix together the cream and cheese and stir into the mushroom and ham mixture. along with the parsley and olives. Stir gently over a low heat until slightly thickened. Season to taste and serve with grated Parmesan cheese.
